definition: name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal
Michael Crichton (1942-), US techno-thriller writer, author of Jurassic Park
pinyin: Mai4 ke4 er3 · Ke4 lai2 dun4

sentences.english: One day Mrs. Slaton gave the class an assignment.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，斯萊頓夫人給全班同學佈置了一項作業。

sentences.english: Singh raves about Lane's performance as Brighton.
sentences.chinese: 辛格讚揚Lane的表演就是布萊頓。

sentences.english: Birds fly over oil on the water near Breton Sound Island.
sentences.chinese: 一大羣鳥飛越靠近布萊頓水聲島的油漬水域。

sentences.english: He was traveling in the Low Countries, and subsequently became acquainted with the Pilgrims' church in Leiden.
sentences.chinese: 他到低地國家旅行，隨後與萊頓的清教徒教會相熟。

sentences.english: This is the website of Faculty of Mathematics and Natural Sciences at the Leiden University.
sentences.chinese: 這是萊頓大學數學與自然科學學院的網站。

sentences.english: We faced Leyton Orient and it was actually my debut.
sentences.chinese: 我們的對手是萊頓東方，實際上那是我的處子秀。

sentences.english: He lives in Clayton, New York.
Dryden often surpasses expectation, and Pope never falls below it.
sentences.chinese: 德萊頓經常出人意料，而蒲柏從不令人失望。

sentences.english: Leyton Orient were in League Two when I was there and Watford were in the Championship.
sentences.chinese: 萊頓東方是英乙球隊，而沃特福德是英冠球隊。

sentences.english: Sharon Biros is a first-grade teacher in Clairton, Pennsylvania.
sentences.chinese: 沙龍柏若絲是一年級教師在賓夕法尼亞州克萊頓。

sentences.english: I think Bournemouth 's a much nicer town than Brighton.
sentences.chinese: 渤恩慕是一個比布萊頓好得多的城市。

sentences.english: Mrs. Slaton collected the papers and nothing more was said.
sentences.chinese: 斯萊頓夫人收齊了同學們的作文，也沒有再說什麼。

sentences.english: I'm getting the car ready for the London to Brighton race now.
sentences.chinese: 現在我正爲參加從倫敦開到布萊頓的比賽作準備。

sentences.english: To drink one last cup of coffee at the Lyric Bistro in Clayton.
sentences.chinese: 在克萊頓的抒情的小酒館再喝上最後一杯咖啡。

sentences.english: The next thing that Mrs. Slaton said changed the course of Jean''s life.
sentences.chinese: 斯萊頓夫人接着說的一番話改變了瓊的生活道路。

sentences.english: Lawrence River. To drink one last cup of coffeeat the Lyric Bistro in Clayton.
sentences.chinese: 在克萊頓的抒情的小酒館再喝上最後一杯咖啡。

definition: Michelangelo Buonarroti (1475-1564), Renaissance painter and sculptor
Taiwan equivalent of 莫奈[Mo4 nai4]
